title: Python
description: The Python brand is widely recognized for its signature colors. The vibrant yellow (hex: FFDE57), reminiscent of energy and innovation, is paired with a calming blue (hex: 4584B6), symbolizing trust and reliability. A complementing grey (hex: 646464) adds balance and professionalism to the palette. These colors are prominently noted in the Python community and are an integral part of the brand's identity, often seen in official logos and promotional materials sourced from their dedicated community resources.
